description: Simulates keys able to be pressed that are not text keys to the browser. Full list of supported keys can be found here: https://github.com/SeleniumHQ/selenium/blob/master/dotnet/src/webdriver/Keys.cs (pass the field name as the action argument).

examples.description: Perform keyboard [Enter] action (press enter) on the specified element.
Perform keyboard [Control]+[A] action (ctrl+A) on the specified element.

name: Keyboard

properties.onElement: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.argument: The text to type into the element.

summary: Simulates keys able to be pressed that are not text keys.
